channel.title: Art on Ross Knapman
channel.description: Recent content in Art on Ross Knapman

item.title: AI Can Generate Pretty Good Music Now
item.description: It seems like ChatGPT has been around forever now, and despite only having used it for a year or so, many people wonder how they lived without it. I recently discovered that a similar concept exists for audio, in which songs can be generated from a prompt. One example of such a service is Udio which, at the time of writing, is free to use, albeit with a limited (but generous) number of credits.

item.title: Coffee Cup to Doughnut Animation
item.description: I made this animation using Blender when writing my project proposal for my Studienstiftung application.
